lines.text: I just learned a secret, it's a honey, it's a pip. But the enemy is listening, so I'll never let it slip. 'Cause when I learn a secret, boy, I zipper up my lip!
Now who in hell do you s'pose it was that let my secret out.
Vat vas zat I herd you zay, my little zouerkraut?
He vonders who the hell it vas who let his secret out?
[Hitler holds up a mirror in front of Snafu]
It's a cinch to keep a secret, if a feller just takes care.
He's zailing on a troop ship, now vee gotta find out vere!
